short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps create eBay listings out of 3rd party retailers. More info on https://listerhero.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lister Hero is The Chrome extension for Dropshippers. Add your listings on autopilot and watch your productivity grow exponentially. Enjoy the variety of the supported platforms and make your business pleasant and hassle-free.
More info on https://listerhero.com
